description:
### Document Name - AWSQuickSetupType-Scheduler-ChangeCalendarState
## What does this document do?
This document starts the State Manager Associations immediately and only one time.

## Input Parameters
* AutomationAssumeRole: (Required) The ARN of the IAM role that this runbook will use to execute automation.
* AssociationIDs: (Required) The association IDs that you want to run immediately and only one time.

AssociationIDs.description: (Required) List of the State Manager Association IDs to start - must be valid UUID format

AutomationAssumeRole.description: (Required) The ARN of the role that allows Automation to perform the actions on your behalf.
